text: We have an obligation and a responsibility to be investing in our students and our schools. We must make sure that people who have the grades, the desire and the will, but not the money, can still get the best education possible.
author: Barack Obama

text: Money won't buy happiness, but it will pay the salaries of a large research staff to study the problem.
author: Bill Vaughan

text: Friendship and money: oil and water.
author: Mario Puzo

text: Ultimately, if you can say that I'm a bad owner and we're winning championships, I can live with that. But if we're not making the playoffs and we're spending and losing money, then I have to look in the mirror and say maybe I'm not taking the necessary steps to doing what it takes to run an organization.
author: Michael Jordan

text: When I chased after money, I never had enough. When I got my life on purpose and focused on giving of myself and everything that arrived into my life, then I was prosperous.
author: Wayne Dyer
